title: MEMEenthusiastic
author: MEMEenthusiastic
content: ABOUT: NeverGibUpFren came into existence towards the end of May 2023 on the online platform 4chan, initially as a humorous experiment. However, a passionate group of individuals embraced the concept, seeing potential in transforming NGUF into a novel cryptocurrency and a social movement.The initial version of NGUF, known as NGUF v1, had certain inherent flaws within its contract that were unalterable. Nonetheless, a dedicated cohort of enthusiasts managed to track down the token's creator and persuaded them to develop a new iteration - NGUF v2, which is the current version in use. During the migration process, all participants who held tokens in the prototype version were offered the opportunity to transfer their holdings on a 1:1 basis.The central objective behind the project was to establish a cryptocurrency that prioritized friendliness. To achieve this, NGUF incorporates security measures designed to impede various forms of MEV (Miner Extractable Value) bot attacks, while also preventing large-scale holders, commonly referred to as whales, from amassing wealth at the expense of smaller investors. Furthermore, the overarching aim is to foster a thriving community where camaraderie reigns and everyone is regarded as a friend.TOKENOMICS: NeverGibUpFren" utilizes a couple of strategies to ensure fair trading.- No blacklist, whitelist, or entitled owner.- No tax, no burn, and a capped total supply of 100,000 tokens.- Initial LP burned.- The Anti-Whale strategy blocks any transfer larger than 1% of the total supply. This meansnobody can move more than 1000 tokens in a single transaction.Additionally there is a cooldown strategy that allows an address to only make 1 transactionevery 5 minutes. This prevents bots from frontrunning, sandwiching, etc. and supports theAnti-Whale strategy.- Keep in mind you can only buy, sell, or transfer a max. of 1000 tokens every 5 minutes!- About ~9000 nguf were allocated to the DAO which is a Gnosis Multisig Safe with theaddress: 0x06E7F45eC9d73957d634d12e1B2AFD3525294117METAVERSE GAME: - Dedicated members within our community are actively engaged in the development of an exciting project known as "Frenverse." This immersive gaming experience is set to become the premier metaverse for our community, where individuals can connect and interact as frens. Notably, our very own cryptocurrency, $NGUF, will serve as the in-game currency, further enhancing the dynamic virtual ecosystem.ROADMAP: Frenstone 1:- Launch of v2 - Getting listed on coinmarketcap (CMC) - Setting up social media accounts - Creating a website - 100+ frens - Getting listed on moontok Frenstone 2:- YouTube channel - Whitepaper- OpenAI powered Twitter bot Â [You can tag @LiftUsUpFrenly on Twitter]- Manifesto- Getting listed on coingecko- 500+ frens- more competitions and more activities (movie nights, gaming)Frenstone 3:- video game frenverse release- NFT drop- 1000+ frensFrenstone 4:- SEC destroyed, Gary and other traitors jailed - world dominanceCONCLUSION: In conclusion, the world can be a mischievous place, often overshadowing our successes while highlighting even the smallest of failures. However, our community aims to change that narrative. We seek to create a collective where support and respect thrive, where individuals can rely on each other without being ignored. NGUF is not just a token; it represents an entire way of life. We invite everyone to join us in embracing this mindset - the relentless pursuit of our goals, no matter the number of obstacles or failures we encounter along the way.This coin is not just another digital currency. It serves a crucial purpose in a world that often undervalues perseverance and resilience. NGUF inspires us to never give up, fren, and to continue striving towards our aspirations. By adopting this approach, we empower ourselves to overcome over 9,000 obstacles and failures, knowing that success awaits us on the other side. With NGUF, we are building a community that understands the importance of determination, and we invite you to be part of this movement.So, let's unite and unlock our true potential. Let's show the world the power of unwavering dedication. Together, we can prove that if we never give up, everything will work out in the end. Join us on this incredible journey and embrace the possibilities that lie ahead with NGUF.________________________________________Website:nevergibupfren.eth.limo
